title: Art Deco display face for A Glimpse Inside the Mind of Charles Swan III poster
content:
I expected to find this one amongst Nick Curtis’ typefaces, but no luck so far. Does anyone recognize this Art Deco display face?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818182410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/glimpse_inside_the_mind_of_charles_swan_iii_type1_6453.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: It is Plug-Nickel Black (Regular) and you are right it is by Nick-Curtis

Oh, it’s there among the freeware…  
 [http://www.1001freefonts.com/PlugNickel.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818182410/http:/www.1001freefonts.com/PlugNickel.php "http://www.1001freefonts.com/PlugNickel.php")
